title.narrative: Microprojets communaux et associatifs à Brazzaville phase II (MICAB II)

description.narrative: Objectif Global : Contribuer à :- Améliorer le cadre de vie des populations urbaines- Renforcer les organisations de la société civile en tant quacteurs du changement social et dans leur rle de partenaire des politiques publiques- Renforcer la concertation et le partenariat entre les autorités locales et la société civile.Objectif Spécifique : Promouvoir des conditions durables pour lamélioration des services de base à Brazzaville (Talanga, Mfilou, Bacongo et Makélékélé)

description.narrative: 4 arrondissements urbains de Brazzaville: - Talanga- Mfilou,- Bacongo- Makélékélé

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
